title: Timberlux New York Black Cap-Toe Brogue Shoes, Men Dress Shoes Goodyear Welted
features: UPDATE YOUR WARDROBE: Add a touch of classy sophistication with this pair of TimberLux cap toe men’s brogues. They’re handcrafted and provide your style a one-of-a-kind look.
DESIGN SPECIFICATIONS: Made of full grain calfskin leather, this pair of black/chocolate brown cap-toe dress shoes has a cushioned insole and lace-up feature for comfort and luxurious style.
GOODYEAR WELTED CONSTRUCTION: These brogue men’s dress shoes feature the highest quality of construction for a custom fit that molds your feet and increases the life of the shoes.

AVAILABLE SIZES: You can order a pair of these nice dress shoes for men in whole and half sizes from 7-14. With TimberLux New York shoes, you’ll enjoy maximum comfort without sacrificing quality or style.

CARE AND MAINTENANCE: For care and maintenance, store these handcrafted black dress shoes in a shoe bag and use a shoe horn to maintain the shape. To clean your men’s brogue shoes, use a soft cotton cloth.
description: Upscale your look with these TimberLux black/chocolate brown cap-toe brogues. Handcrafted with full grain calfskin leather, these one-of-a-kind brogues are an excellent addition to your wardrobe. The tight grain resists moisture and provides you with a luxurious look.
The lace-up style gives it a classic appeal, while its cushioned insole is comfortable and breathable.
These shoes also have a leather-grafted Dainite sole to withstand daily wear and tear.

TimberLux is a brand born from the minds of fashion industry veterans who were eager to bring back the tradition of craftsmanship in men's footwear. We consider shoes as art and treat them in this way. We use the old traditions of shoemaking to transform Italian leather into premium shoes.
